name: An Eco-Friendly Act
description:
You are Axel, a little boy, and you are in a parc.

You have some dirty paper in your hand, and your mother asks you to put it into the bin next to you.

But... will you do that?

Reach the best ending, or try to do the waste to get the worst ending. Overall, there are Good and Bad Endings, 1 Worst and 1 Best Endings, plus... an amazing Secret Ending!

Graphisms by Cyberboy (2 backgrounds by Creersonjeu and 1 from free ressourses of the Internet), musics from Sonic CD, and developped on GameMaker Studio 2 by Cyberboy

Enjoy!
